text: braced for an assault the report
suggests the Ukrainian government has
launched its most determined operation
yet to dislodge these pro-russian
separatists from their positions in and

tensions and stakes again in the crisis
over Ukraine's unsettled East and the
government forces have already paid a

two military helicopters downed in the

the authorities in Kiev we heard shots
the helicopters flying it's scary the

you know this man was abandoned by his

is blocked by locals underlining the

here to prevent any military people from

it's demanded a halt to what it calls a
